reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweatshirt soft, comfortable, and well-made, with a good fit that's roomy without being too big. They appreciate its style and weight, noting it's not too heavy or light, and one customer mentions it's perfect for fall transitions. The size and material quality receive mixed feedback - while some say it's true to size, others find it runs large, and while some like the fabric, others describe it as

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cozy
items.body: So soft and cozy! I almost didn’t order this but after some cooler weather I thought I’d give it a shot and price was right. I live in Florida so heavy stuff is just too much this is perfect. It’s light weight but will keep the chill off. Plus you look good doing so. I don’t know how to describe the material except if satin and flannel had a baby this is it. I just received this so don’t know about how it will do after the wash. I expect it to hold up well as it seems very well made. Love this and may go back for more colors. Read more
items.author: Carol

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable budget shirt. Get one for yourself!
items.body: Whoever said this shirt was silky soft wasn't joking! It's very soft and comfortable and just a bit stretchy, so no worries of ripping seams when you take it on or off. It does not have any smell fresh out of the bag; material is fairly thin, so would definitely need to layer if looking for warmth. This sweatshirt is comfy to wear - nice enough for work or a casual day out. I usually can't do hoodies because the thickness makes my back hurt leaning back in a chair, but not so much with this one. Regardless of other's suggestions to size up, I actually stayed with my normal size and am happy with the perfect fit. Read more
items.author: LD 825571

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great shirt! No way it's a sweatshirt
items.body: Calling these shirts a "sweatshirt" is ridiculous. no way would the fabric be considered sweatshirt material. However, I love the soft supple fabric that is light and similar to a synthetic flannel. I'm 5'2", 170 lbs, thick in the middle. The xl fits great. Comfortable shirts that get compliments from strangers wanting to know where I found them. I have three colors of the plaid. Read more
items.author: Just Saying

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect gift
items.body: So soft and comfortable! Love this item! Price was excellent. Warm soft and has not shrinked when washed. Fit it perfect to size and it is not heavy light and soft Read more
items.author: Carol West

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Literally hoodie
items.body: Tru to size. Very soft & comfy. We'll made & East to wash. Not quite as heavy as a regular hoodie but for late fall weather it was perfect. I paied with brown jeans or gray or black leggins Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shirt is soft and looks awesome on you
items.body: This shirt is soft and so nicely made. Many compliments wearing it. I came home and ordered another one. I ordered a medium I am 5ft 2 and 139lbs. It fit just right not to big. Read more
items.author: ginny

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfy and cute with jeans
items.body: Love this shirt. Very soft and comfortable. Washer up nicely. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but don’t like drawstring
items.body: Cute too. Plaid material cute and comfortable. I didn’t like the hood and the string. Nice tunic length and good value. Fit well, true to size. Read more
items.author: HJ

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Leopard Black, Plaid Green, Light Army Green, Coffee, Leopard Brown, Plaid Colorblock, Light Purple, Plaid Hot Pink, Plaid Dusty Pink, Plaid Blue, Plaid Grey, Print Striped, Hot Pink, Plaid Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
